
is a proxy server which gives access to all def:bo_portal 's over https.
acts like a reverse proxy (means like a webserver)

url:

{code}
https://[cloudcenter_bo_proxy]/[bo_env_guid]/[the url of the bo_portal]
{code}

because of the guid only users who know the guid have access to a def:bo_env

this allows access to the bo_portals without vpn
